suggestions.original: To further enhance the transformation dimension, consider incorporating more innovative elements that push the boundaries of traditional celebratory scenes. Additionally, integrating a variety of textures or mixed media could add depth and a unique tactile quality to the artwork. Exploring different perspectives, such as a bird's-eye view or a more dynamic angle, could also provide a fresh and striking viewpoint.
